utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wait. Before we go in, I just want you to know I love you. I had a great time on our honeymoon, and I can’t wait to go in there and spend the rest of our life together.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You’re really sticking with the shell necklace huh?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! You’re back!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi sweetie!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Come on in!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So how was the honeymoon?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, so much fun. But the best part is, we met this incredible couple on the way back.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That was the best part? Good honeymooning tiger.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, they were really cool. They were on their honeymoon too!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: They’re terrific, and they live right here in the city.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, can we go call them? Is it too soon to call? I wanna call.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m sorry, we’re just kinda excited because we finally have a couple to hang out with.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: A couple? Like two people? Like one , two people?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This is different! Greg and Jenny are in a relationship.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, Greg and Jenny yuck! Hi Greg, I’m Chandler this is Monica. Hi Monica, this is Jenny. Hi Jenny. Hi Greg.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Listen, they are really great. If you just got a chance…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Y’know what? Why don’t you just give us our souvenirs and get the hell out of here?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We really…didn’t get a chance to…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You have got to be kidding me!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We didn’t get anything for anyone.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hm-mm! Yeah nice necklace!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That you can have.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hello!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Welcome home.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, how was the honeymoon?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It was great! It was great! How about you?! I mean you’re having a baby!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! Look! I have a sonogram picture!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh great!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ross! It’s got your wavy black lines!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, so now that Ross knows can you tell us y’know how it happened? I mean, when did it happen? How many times did it happen?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Monica! That’s not right! Start with where.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well it happened about six weeks ago, and uh I had just got home from work and Ross was already there ‘cause I guess he had been hanging out with Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You’re welcome buddy.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, thanks.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And so I had a lot of work to do so Ross, nice guy that he is, offered to help me out. And then we had a little wine, we got to talking, and the next thing you know out of nowhere Ross comes on to me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Umm that’s…that’s a little misleading.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What is?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: The lie you just told.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That-that you came on to me?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: There’s the one!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But you did! I mean, let’s be honest.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes let’s. Y’know what? Uh, it’s-it’s not important. What is important is that, is that we’re having a baby. And it’s not—Doesn’t matter who came on to who.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whom. That’s right.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You know you kissed me first.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? What?! You were begging me to kiss you! You-you-you were sending me signals all over the place!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I was sending you signals?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh please. Okay, anyone in this room think that I would send Ross begging symbols, please show of hands.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y’know what?! It doesn’t matter! It doesn’t matter what you believe! What matters is what happened!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. So these signals Ross, explain this to me, ‘cause maybe I need to be more careful. I mean, am I sending you these signals right now?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y’know what? Y’know what? Rachel, just-just drop it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No please, show me how I begged you!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I can show you, I have it on videotape! It’s an expression.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I can’t believe he taped the two of them having sex!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! You gotta tell a girl before you tape her. Such a rookie mistake.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y’know who has a great video camera?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Greg and Jenny?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Do you still wanna call ‘em? I wanna call ‘em.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Let’s call ‘em.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! Ask them if they brought their friends any souvenirs!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hello? Eighth street deli?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, hang up! You get food poisoning just talkin’ to that place.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh sorry, wrong number.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Here you go.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hello? It’s the deli again!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right! I’ll have a sandwich!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don’t think this number’s right!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You got fake numbered.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?! People don’t do that!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh I think we do.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: They gave us a fake number? Why? Why would they do that?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don’t know! You were a delight to talk to. You asked all those insightful, great questions.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And you’ve never been funnier. Joke, joke, joke, you were a hoot!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Y’know what? Don’t worry about it, you still got me and Phoebe.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Excuse me, I don’t want Greg and Jenny’s rejects.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rachel won’t talk to me! She won’t even open the door!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hmm, I wonder why. Pervert!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, listen I am not a pervert!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That’s like the pervert motto! Yeah! Yeah! They have you raise your right hand, put your left hand down your pants, and repeat that!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Filming Rachel is not something I planned. Okay look, here’s what happened, and Joey you-you can back me up on this. All right, about-about a month and a half ago I came to you with a problem? Umm, a personal thing.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Personal thing? What personal thing? I don’t know.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: About…about sex? That I hadn’t had sex in months?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah I knew what you were talkin’ about.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Do you have a minute? I’d like to talk to you about something I’m, I’m really uncomfortable talking about.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sure. What? About uh, you showering with your mom?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I actually had a topic in mind! I’m, I’m kinda going through a dry spell, sex wise.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa, for like months?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Five to be lying, six.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Six months? Whoa that’s rough.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I mean it’s not all bad. I’m learning to appreciate the uh, smaller things in life. Like the sound of a bird and the color of the sky.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: The sky’s blue Ross and I had sex yesterday!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Please, help me! I have a date tonight. It has to go well okay—I’m scared for my health!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay. Okay. Umm…Ooh! Oh-oh, I got something. It’s this story I came up with, very romantic. I swear any woman that hears it; they’re like putty.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Really? Well then tell it to me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay. Now you’re gonna want to have sex with me when you hear it, but you have to remember it is just the story.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’ll try to control myself.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay. Years ago, when I was backpacking across Western Europe…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You were backpacking across Western Europe?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Have a nice six more months Ross!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay! Okay! Okay. I’m sorry. Please, please, you were in Western Europe and?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I was just outside Barcelona hiking in the foothills of Mount Tibidabo. I was at the end of this path and I came to a clearing and there was a lake, very secluded. And there were tall trees all around. It was dead silent. Gorgeous. And across the lake I saw…a beautiful woman…bathing herself…but she was crying…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: Umm, this is great wine.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It’s from France…In Europe…Western Europe. Y’know umm, a few years ago I actually was backpacking across Western Europe.

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh-hmm—Wait! It gets better. Um, yeah I was in Barcelona.

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: I studied for a year in Barcelona.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Anyway, umm so I was um, I was hiking…

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: I love hiking!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh that’s great! I was hiking along the foothills of Mount Tibidaybo…

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: I think its Tibidabo.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay! Do you wanna tell the story?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa! What are you doing here? How did your date go?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Great! I’m across the street having sex with her right now. Your story sucks!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! Look, if it didn’t work it’s because you didn’t tell it right! Show me how you did it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! No, I don’t…don’t want to.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How long since you’ve seen a girl naked?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I was backpacking across Western Europe.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’m not feeling it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I was just outside Barcelona, hiking…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! No! No Ross! I’m not hot! Are you hot?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It’s been six months! I’m always hot!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well you’re not selling the story! It’s like; it’s like you don’t believe it! Look, I gotta go. I got a date, but try this. Do what I do when I’m preparing for an audition. Okay? I’ll set you up with my video camera and you can record yourself and-and see what you’re doing wrong.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’ll try that.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right now… All right, you’re all set up. You’re good to go. Just hit record. All right?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Good luck.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thanks. And-and hey Joe?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Listen, if you ever have any problem with the ladies you know I’ll help you out.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That means a lot to me man.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hello! Can I get you anything? Huh? Lens cleaner? Your battery okay? Rachel!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh Ross!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thank God you’re here! You have to help me! Were you just talking to yourself?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That’s less embarrassing, yes. Yes I was.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So when she came in, I got distracted and totally forgot about the camera. It kept rolling and recorded everything.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, we’re gonna need to see that tape.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, definitely.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What a great idea! That will get Rachel to forgive me!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Y’know what? This is not fair to her. Let’s just forget the tape!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thank you. No!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You’re right.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Joey! No!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Loud and clear!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I still don't get why Greg and Jenny would give us a fake number.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Y’know, if they knew what they were doing they probably didn’t give you real names either.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, maybe people give out fake numbers, but they don’t give out fake names.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh yeah? Hi, Ken Adams, nice to meet you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Regina Philange.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I still don’t get it, we didn’t do anything wrong.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know! Although, you did tell an awful lot of jokes.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I thought you said those jokes were funny. Joke! Joke! Joke!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joke. Joke. Blah! Blah!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well maybe it was all of your questions.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What about my questions?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The sheer volume, it was like flying with the Riddler!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, I’m sorry. Was that another joke?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Was that another question?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey! Is Ross still here?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh no Rach, he’s gone. But listen, he told us what happened and it does, it sounds like an honest mistake.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh really? Well how would you like it if I had sex with you and I taped it? Oh forget it! Oh there he is now, the father of my child, the porn king of the west village.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, it was accident! Okay? I-I feel bad that it happened, but I swear, I didn’t even watch it! Anyway, here. I thought you might be more comfortable destroying it yourself.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thank you. What? You don’t want to see this do you?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hell yeah!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I am not gonna show you this!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No! Not the sex part, just the stuff leading up to it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Forget it, she’s destroying it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay fine! Fine! We’ll just have to think of some other way to put the whole ‘Who came onto who,’ thing to rest! Come on now, think!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, forget it Phoebe. Okay? It’s Rachel’s tape and she can do whatever she wants with it. And she wants to destroy it. So, end of story.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I wanna see it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Clearly you don’t want people to see this tape. Now I don’t want people to see this tape either, but you so badly don’t people to see it makes me want to see it. You see?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Are we watchin’ the tape or not?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don’t want people to see it for your sake.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ahh, I don’t believe you. I think you don’t want them to see you begging me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rachel, please…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ah, a little preview!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Fine. Fine, but I want the record to show that I tried to take the high road, because in about five minutes I’m gonna be saying…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, here we go.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hello! Can I get you anything?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’m so happy!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, thank God you’re here! You have to help me! Were you just talking to yourself?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: There I am.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You’re gonna get pregnant.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I screwed up so bad, I told Monica that I would stuff and send all these wedding invitations like weeks ago and I-I…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You didn’t do it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I-I know—I had put them in…in-in my desk at work and I completely forgot about them until today.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Sweetie okay. It’s okay. Everybody made it to the wedding. I’m fine.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Kinda hurtin’ my hand though.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I cannot believe that I did this. Especially after Monica just went on and on and on about it! "Okay Rachel! Here are the invitations Rachel! Now be very careful Rachel! Please, drinking no liquids around the invitations Rachel!" Whoa oh! Oh-oh-oh! Oh…oh-oh-oh…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Did you do it on our invitations?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Not on the ones we sent out.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, just the ones gave back to us and we had framed!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Can you believe this is already happening? I mean it seems like yesterday they just got engaged.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know. Hey remember…remember the night they got engaged? How uh, you and I almost…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I remember how we almost. Do you think we would’ve gone through with it? Y’know, if we hadn’t gotten caught. Do you think we would’ve done it?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I mean I…I know I wanted to. I just, I just wasn’t sure if you wanted to.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh I wanted to.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So we…we both wanted to.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Interesting.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah. Anyway umm, it probably worked out for the best.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yeah, sure.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, in about ten seconds you’re gonna see him kiss me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And in about five seconds you’re gonna see why.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross did I ever tell you about the time that I went backpacking through Western Europe?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, get ready to see some beggin’!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, you came on to Ross!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Now I’m so happy.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What are you talking about?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You used the Europe story!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That’s the magic story you use when you wanna have sex!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: How do you know about that story?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How do you know about that story?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I heard it from my friend Irene who heard it from some guy!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Some guy!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No. No, she told me his name was Ken Adams.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ken Adams!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So uh, apparently people are familiar with the Europe story?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah. Listen about that, the whole uh, who came on to who thing really doesn’t matter. I mean, I think it would’ve happened either way. I mean if you hadn’t initiated it I-I-I know I would’ve.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It was an amazing night.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It was. It was an amazing night.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You think it looked amazing?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I uh… I don’t know. I mean I…I honestly didn’t watch it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, me neither. Yet…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uhhhhhh…that-that may be weird.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, it would be really weird.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Good luck.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Good luck to you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Mind if I mute?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh please.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, oh there go the clothes.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You are undressing very quickly.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Six months Rachel, six months.

utterance.speaker: Ross and Rachel
utterance.content: Ah. Oh.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey. We-we look…we look pretty good.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That’s what I was gonna say.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh nice tan!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thank you! I had just gone to the beach that weekend.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ah….

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Have you been working out?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I have been working out.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really? Wow, this is so much better than I…

utterance.speaker: Ross and Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh! Ew!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh that’s not pretty.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! Oh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh God!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh no!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, make it stop!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh no!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Make it stop!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Have to make it stop!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No!!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hello Greg? Hi, this is Monica from the plane? Listen, the number that you gave me 853-5… That is their old number! Jenny’s been giving it out since they moved!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Jenny! That is so Jenny!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey listen umm, how would you like to get together? Say next Saturday? Okay, how about Sunday? Okay umm, the week after that? The week after that? Y’know what Greg? Y’know what? We are good, interesting, funny people with good questions and if you and your precious Jenny can’t see that then… January 15th? We’ll see you then! Okay!
